name: Lord of Atlantis
oracle_text: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Bridge from Below
oracle_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if this card is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if this card is in your graveyard, exile this card.

name: Mephidross Vampire
oracle_text:
Flying
Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

name: Pitiless Plunderer
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "The trick to getting the biggest share is to be the last one standing."

name: Breeches, Brazen Plunderer
oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Dargo, the Shipwrecker
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn.
Trample
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Rampaging Ferocidon
oracle_text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters, this creature deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Unlike their pack-hunting kin, ferocidons stalk in solitude and lash out at everything that approaches.

name: Underworld Breach
oracle_text:
Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this enchantment.

name: Carnage Tyrant
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Trample, hexproof
flavor_text: Outsiders may marvel at the Sun Empire's "domesticated" dinosaurs, but those who live alongside them know they can never truly be tamed.

name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
oracle_text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Polyraptor
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever this creature is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of this creature.
flavor_text: If you see one, you're already surrounded.

name: Kalamax, the Stormsire
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.

name: Lord Windgrace
oracle_text:
+2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.
−3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.
Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever Mirri attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
As long as Mirri is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

name: Thrasios, Triton Hero
oracle_text:
{4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
flavor_text: "When you go where the currents take you, you'll never run short of things to discover."

name: Mana Crypt
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, this artifact deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.

name: Star Compass
oracle_text:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

name: Ghostly Prison
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

name: Fabricate
oracle_text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Show and Tell
oracle_text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

name: Tragic Slip
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

name: Victimize
oracle_text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

name: Gamble
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

name: Crashing Footfalls
oracle_text:
Suspend 4—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Create two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.

name: Tireless Tracker
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Drown in the Loch
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
• Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

name: Field of the Dead
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
Whenever this land or another land you control enters, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Stoneforge Mystic
oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card_faces.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
This creature can block only creatures with flying.

card_faces.name: Petty Theft
card_faces.oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: Desertion
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"It is one thing to run away. It is quite another to escape your fate."
—Oko

name: Morbid Opportunist
oracle_text: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text: "It's downright selfish to die with full pockets."

name: Port Razer
oracle_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
This creature can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.
flavor_text: "We're taking back what's ours. And a little bit of what's yours."

name: Scapeshift
oracle_text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"These people come from their cities and think to tame the wilderness. They forget that here, the wilderness has a head start."
—Selvala

name: Mystic Snake
oracle_text:
Flash
When this creature enters, counter target spell.
flavor_text: Travelers who have reached the headwaters of Fool's Fall say that strange serpents dwell in the waters there, though none can recall any more than that.

name: Notion Thief
oracle_text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
flavor_text: "All these childhood memories are getting in the way of the vault codes."

name: Desert
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.
flavor_text:
"Only a fool goes out there unprepared. If the heat doesn't get you, the time alone with your thoughts likely will."
—Ertha Jo, frontier mentor

name: Prismatic Vista
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: When Kellan let his eyes wander to the horizon, he saw a land whose destiny was as uncertain as his own.

name: Thought-Knot Seer
oracle_text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.
flavor_text: Its gaze gifts you with knowledge no mortal mind should possess.

name: Prismatic Ending
oracle_text: Converge — Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
flavor_text: Sagas sing of realms long forgotten, shattered by doomskars and cleaved violently from the World Tree.

name: Dismember
oracle_text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"No one has heard Drivnod speak. But we have seen him do unspeakable things. As he drifts over Ish Sah, a deathly whisper rides the wind. I can never watch for long—I turn away and hide."
—Kara Vrist, resistance spymaster

name: Persist
oracle_text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"I paid a price to one I will not name to escape the abyss. A bit of my soul for a second chance. And I'd do it again, and again—until I had no soul left to trade."
—Tinua, Skirsdag cultist

name: Expressive Iteration
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
flavor_text: "Art exposes truth. Each step of my dance brings me closer to the secrets of the universe."

name: Solitude
oracle_text:
Flash
Lifelink
When this creature enters, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power.
Evoke—Exile a white card from your hand.

name: Subtlety
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When this creature enters, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

name: Grief
oracle_text:
Menace
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Evoke—Exile a black card from your hand.

name: Fury

Double strike

name: Endurance
oracle_text:
Flash
Reach

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor_text: "I'm not as quick as I used to be, but the wheat doesn't mind."

name: Ledger Shredder
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, this creature connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text: "Pah! You call this a comprehensive? I call this nest-stuffing!"

name: Rat Colony
oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.
A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

name: Relentless Rats
oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.
flavor_text: Each of them is a bad influence on the rest.

name: Kindred Charge
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"Anyone can live next door, but when you fight to defend your neighbors, you become a village."
—Rho, veteran hero

name: Sylvan Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text: The magic of the land is a thread that weaves all of Valley into a tapestry, connecting even the most distant of friends.

name: Toski, Bearer of Secrets
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Indestructible
Toski attacks each combat if able.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

name: Frogmite
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
flavor_text:
"It started as a prototype for a frog diving suit, but the internal mechanisms didn't leave room for the frog."
—Fitzwhisker, otterfolk inventor

name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Secluded Courtyard
oracle_text:
As this land enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.

name: Hallowed Haunting
oracle_text:
As long as you control seven or more enchantments, creatures you control have flying and vigilance.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, create a white Spirit Cleric creature token with "This token's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Spirits you control."

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: The group called the Benefactors offers what aid and protection it can to other survivors, marking precious safe zones with the sign of the flame.

name: Expropriate
oracle_text: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.
flavor_text: Even those who think they have nothing have something left to lose.

name: Phantasmal Image
oracle_text: You may have this creature enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

name: Damnation
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Bound to a single house, Valgavoth simply expanded its boundaries until it consumed the plane, turning a vibrant world into his playground of terror.

name: Sacrifice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.
flavor_text: Cultists eagerly undergo the Rite of the Threshold, allowing Valgavoth to feed on their fear and bind them to the essence of the House.

name: Maddening Hex
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, roll a d6. This Aura deals damage to that player equal to the result. Then attach this Aura to another one of your opponents chosen at random.

name: Unholy Heat
oracle_text:
Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: He turns every room into a crematorium.

name: Collected Company
oracle_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Survivors who stay together, slay together.

name: Noxious Revival
oracle_text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Nothing I beat down stays down. I love this place!"
—Tyvar

name: Condemn
oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"Cyclical as the passing of days, the fiend would return again. And like the sun rising, so would a champion to slay it."
—*Heroics: A Book of Fables*

name: Sphinx's Tutelage
oracle_text:
Whenever you draw a card, target opponent mills two cards. If two nonland cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.
{5}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Sailors swear by the Sphinx's stars, which always seem to point the way home.

name: Grim Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"I freely trade away my breaths, for the only one must keep is my last."
—Sopia, Skelle cleric

name: Embercleave

Flash
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature you control.

name: Goblin Bushwhacker

Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
When this creature enters, if it was kicked, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

name: Bloom Tender
oracle_text: {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.
flavor_text: Within sky-scraping gardens, New Capenna's fashionable druids maintain the last ties to the war-ravaged land their ancestors left behind.

name: Paradise Druid
oracle_text:
This creature has hexproof as long as it's untapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "Hello again, my metamorphic friends. What stories have you brought to tell me today?"

name: Akroma's Memorial
oracle_text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
flavor_text:
"Those who do evil shall face wrath unrelenting."
—Memorial inscription

name: Temporal Manipulation
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor_text: "Proper chronomancy research can't be rushed. Luckily, I've got all the time in the world."

name: Fiend Artisan
oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

oracle_text:
Vigilance
When this creature enters, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
When this creature dies, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Thoughtcast
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Exist in the moment. Ignore the world around you. Embrace the one truth of reality, that all life is motion."

oracle_text:
Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Whenever you discard a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Whenever you discard a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

name: Lord of the Undead
oracle_text:
Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Chandra's Ignition
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

name: Galvanic Blast
oracle_text:
Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "Where do you think you're going, chum?"

name: Pathbreaker Ibex
oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

name: Chrome Mox
oracle_text:

{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.
flavor_text: Ferren Gibrar's award-winning invention from the Inventor's Fair-now available to the general public.

name: Skysovereign, Consul Flagship
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Skysovereign enters or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Engineers take inspiration form nature when it comes to efficiency and aerodynamics. Why not intimidation too?

name: Eerie Ultimatum
oracle_text: Return any number of permanent cards with different names from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"We are the voice of the untethered and lost ancestors. The memory of the Abzan. We guide those that yet live."
—Betor

name: Emergent Ultimatum
oracle_text: Search your library for up to three monocolored cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one of those cards. Shuffle that card into your library. You may cast the other cards without paying their mana costs. Exile Emergent Ultimatum.
flavor_text:
"I will give you a fair and beautiful judgment."
—Teval

name: Genesis Ultimatum
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of permanent cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand. Exile Genesis Ultimatum.
flavor_text:
"We sing and the chorus of creation responds."
—Ureni

name: Inspired Ultimatum
oracle_text: Target player gains 5 life, Inspired Ultimatum deals 5 damage to any target, then you draw five cards.
flavor_text:
"The Way tells us we must strive towards unity of mind. Through shared understanding, we may yet put an end to strife on Tarkir."
—Shiko

name: Ruinous Ultimatum
oracle_text: Destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control.
flavor_text:
"Strength comes from community. Together, we can destroy any enemy."
—Neriv

name: Arid Mesa
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"This was where I fought my first battle under Kolaghan. How I have outgrown her."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

name: Marsh Flats
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"We remember all the world has endured, everything it has gone through to bring us to today. We are proud of Tarkir."
—Betor

name: Misty Rainforest
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: In the mist, turbulent enough to deafen. Beneath the boughs, serene enough to soothe.

name: Scalding Tarn
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"I came here often to meditate on Ojutai's teachings. Now, I must also consider his failings."
—Narset

name: Verdant Catacombs
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Where dragonlords once schemed, their memory now dissipates.
